title: ut slug vullage :update 2 great news read post:
content:
this is the release topic of my keen level in unreal tournament

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
first of all READ THE WHOLE FUCL POST so that if you have a problem you can fix it without asking me how to fix it
if you can't get it working or if my instructions are unclear you can ask for help
i have better things to do than answer the same question over and over again
thanks for understanding
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

sadly i didn't have time to put all the functions in it that i wanted to put in it [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] maybe i will add them later

[for the people that don't have unreal tournament i have great news you can get it for FREE by downloading a trial version and using the 436 nodelta patch [url=http://www.planetmonsterhunt.com/forums/viewtopic.php?t=642]click HERE for links[/url] [for the admins i'm not linking to warez] ]

more news i made a simple instal version [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[hr]
there are a few instructions to play my level and some files you need

the easy instal version [url=http://files.commanderkeen.org/users/memsys/sp2d-slug_village_E.zip]click me[/url]

you will need oldskoolamp'd
[url=http://www.usaar33.com/filez_main.html]linky to site of maker [you probabley want the lite version][/url]

the latest patch if you have a version older than v436
[url=http://www.beyondunreal.com/main/ut/utessential.php]linky to site with patches[/url]

and my level
[url=http://files.commanderkeen.org/users/memsys/ut_keenlevel/]ok here is my keen level in ut[/url] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

after you installed all the files and activated old skool amp'd [to do this go to mod and click enable old skool amp'd]
you need to double click on my map to play it
when the level is started you need to activate the boots [the little boot icon at the top of the screen]
the Default key is enter if it does not work go to options->old skool configuration -tab: keys
[hr]
here are some screenies of my level

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/shot-01.png[/img]
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/shot-02.png[/img]
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/shot-03.png[/img]
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/shot-04.png[/img]
[url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]

title: the jump boots
content:
read my first post

[quote]Quote:[hr]after you installed all the files you need to double click on my map to play it
when the level is started you need to activate the boots [the little boot icon at the top of the screen]it is probabley enter[hr][/quote]

enter is the default button for "InventoryActivate"
if it does not work look in options -> old skool configuration ->tab: keys add the text you see below to your user.ini [pre] Enter=InventoryActivate[/pre]
if you do the later MAKE SURE noting else is using the enter key because if there is someting that uses enter already like
[pre] MiddleMouse=MoveForwardTab=Type<!--EZCODE BOLD START--><strong>Enter=InventoryActivate</strong><!--EZCODE BOLD END-->Shift=WalkingCtrl=Jump<!--EZCODE BOLD START--><strong>Enter=Fire</strong><!--EZCODE BOLD END-->Pause=Pause[/pre]
you will fire your weapon and activate the selected item at the same time[url=http://profile.xfire.com/memsys][img]http://miniprofile.xfire.com/bg/bg/type/2/memsys.png[/img][/url]
